item.title: About US
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Anifat Balogun, MD

Dr Balogun is a board certified Otolaryngology Head and Neck surgeon. She received her medical degree from Hahnemann University School of Medicine in Philadelphia, PA. She completed her Otolaryngology Head and Neck Surgery training at Montefiore Medical Center and the Albert Einstein College of Medicine in New York. She has been in practice in Washington State since 2000. Dr Balogun established SkinMD to provide an environment where state of the art cosmetic procedures, and the most efficacious of the advances in skin care medicine are provided to our patients with the highest level of care. She is a member of the American Academy of Otolaryngology Head and Neck Surgery, the American Academy of Cosmetic Surgery, the American Society for Laser Medicine and Surgery, the Society of Plastic Surgical Skin Care Specialists and the King County Medical Society.

Policies & Procedures

Appointments

To schedule an appointment or to ask questions about SkinMD services, call (206)525-0903 or send an e-mail to skinmd@skinmdseattle.com. You can also fax us at (866)497-3901. The office is open Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, and Friday 8AM-4PM, Thursday 8AM-7PM. We recommend that appointments be made as far in advance as possible to give you the greatest opportunity to get an appointment that best fits your schedule. A credit card number is required to secure your reservation. We suggest arriving 10-15 minutes prior to your scheduled time to ensure that you receive your full service. If you arrive late, your visit may have to end on scheduled time, so as not to delay the next guest. Late arrivals are still responsible for payment of the full service scheduled.

Cancellation Policy

Our specialists' time is just as valuable as yours and we do our utmost to respect your time. If you are unable to keep an appointment, please let us know at least 24 hours prior to your scheduled time. We reserve the right to charge a fee for appointments not cancelled with ample notice. If you find that you are running more than 15 minutes late for an appointment, we ask that you reschedule so that we may be on time for our next appointment. We require a minimum 24 hours advance notice for all cancellations and changes. If you are unable to keep your appointment, please let us know and we will be happy to reschedule you. However, without a timely cancellation, a $50 dollar service fee will be charged. The credit card holder agrees to be responsible for any fees incurred.

Etiquette & Courtesy

In consideration of all guests, we ask that you either turn off pagers and cell phones or use the vibrate setting when you are visiting SkinMD. We love children too, but it is important that they are supervised at all times when in our office.

Gift Certificate Policy

Gift Certificates are available in any amount and can be purchased by phone, online or in-store. Gift certificates can be redeemed towards any SkinMD service or merchandise unless otherwise stated. Certificates are nonrefundable and valid for 12 months from the date of purchase, unless otherwise specified. Please remember to place your gift certificate in a safe keeping place, as SkinMD is not responsible for lost, stolen, damaged, or misplaced certificates.

Gratuity Policy

SkinMD is a medical facility and our clinical providers do not accept gratuities. Our greatest reward is your expressed appreciation and the referral of our procedures and services to others. Please spend some time to provide us with your feedback by filling out our comment cards. You will be automatically entered in our monthly price drawing.

Insurance

The doctors do not participate with any insurance carriers. Most cosmetic procedures, including laser surgery, are not considered to be medically necessary by insurance carriers and charges will be payable at the time of each treatment visit. The patient is liable for all charges. Procedures that are approved by your insurance carrier may receive some coverage under your insurance benefits. In these cases, you can file an insurance claim yourself. SkinMD can only provide you with a receipt to include with your claim submission. If your insurance carrier is willing to reimburse you, those funds will be sent directly to you.

Payments, Prices, Promotions & Specials

We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, personal checks, and cash. We also accept CareCredit cards and CareCredit Gift Certificates. Prices are subject to change without notification. Promotions and specials may not be combined.

Refund Policy

Due to health concerns, products may not be returned or refunded. We charge a $30 fee for returned checks. Refunds are not permitted on any services or service packages. We recommend that you try a single treatment before purchasing a package. We will apply the purchase price of a single treatment to your package price.

Referrals

The confidence you show by referring your friends is the greatest compliment, for which we are extremely thankful. We offer you specials, promotions and other incentives to extend our gratitude.
We are open to your suggestions. Please let us know how we may serve you better. Comment card are available at the front desk.

item.title: FAQs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Where is SkinMD located? We are conveniently located at 6850 35th Ave NE. Suite #4, Seattle, WA 98115 Map of 6850 35th Ave NE. Suite#4 Seattle, WA 98115 Ph: (206) 525-0903 F: (866) 497 3901 skinmd@skinmdseattle.com Where can I park? Parking is available, free of charge, in our parking lot. Additionally, there is ample street non-metered parking. What are your office hours? The office is open Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday 8AM-4PM, and Thursday 8AM to 7PM. Appointments are required. How can I make an appointment? We can assist you in scheduling your consultation and service appointments when you call us at (206) 525-0903. You can also request an appointment online by clicking on appointments at our website, www.skinmdseattle.com. Why do I need a consultation? All new patients benefit from an initial consultation by one of our medical aestheticians and one of our doctors. Your consultation will include VISIA Complexion Analysis, a thorough skin examination and skin care review. This is followed by a review of treatment options available, preparatory, treatment planning and post-treatment skin care. We provide you a printed summary of your skin analysis and a guide outlining your prescribed morning and evening skincare regimens. Can I have my treatment on the same day as my consultation? Absolutely. Depending on your diagnosis and time available, we can proceed with your treatment on the same day as your consultation. Can my skin condition be treated with a laser? At SkinMD, we have lasers and light devices to treat the following: Brown lesions (pigment), including freckles, age spots, liver spots, or sun spots, "cafe-au-lait" birthmarks, and nevi (moles); Red lesions (vascular), including port-wine stains, hemangiomas ("strawberries"), angiomas ("cherry spots"), telangiectasias or spider veins ("broken capillaries"), and rosacea ("flushing and blushing, red nose"); Unwanted hair on the face, legs or body (darker hair is best); Scars, including hypertrophic scars and keloids (red and raised), acne ("ice pick") scars, burn scars, and surgical scars; Wrinkles, including "crow's feet" (around the eyes), "smoker's lines" (around the mouth), "frown lines"(between the eyes), and "worry lines" (across the forehead). How much do treatments cost? The cost of laser and light treatments vary, depending on the size of the area being treated and the number of pulses delivered. Does the laser hurt? Will I need anesthesia? Each treatment pulse feels like the snap of a rubber band against the skin. Except for sensitive areas, such as around the lips, eyes, and bikini region, which may requires a topical numbing cream applied, treatments require no anesthesia. If a topical anesthetic is required, it is applied by the medical aesthetician or doctor upon your arrival in the office, 30 minutes before your scheduled treatment. How many treatments will I need? The number of treatments needed, will depend on the area or lesion to be treated, your skin type and the laser or light device appropriate for the optimum results. During your initial consultation, we will give you an individual estimate of the most likely number of treatments to expect. How long does the procedure usually take? The length of time it takes to complete each procedure depends on the size of the lesion or the area being treated. Treatments can take as little as 10- 15mins, or as long as 1 hour or more. How long will it take for me to recover following my laser procedure? Depending on the laser used and your skin’s response, you should expect that within an hour or two of your treatment, no one should be able to notice that you had a procedure. You may however, notice darkening of pigmented lesions, slight bruising, or skin redness. Women may apply makeup over post-treatment moisturizer and sunblock after laser procedures. Redness, bruising scabbing, or flaking after your procedure can last up to 2 weeks, depending on the laser. During this time you can resume your regular activities. Always remember to use sunscreen of at least SPF 30 when outdoors. What treatments other than laser surgery are available at SkinMD? Medical grade chemical peels, various dermal fillers and Botox injections, Steroid injections for acne, traditional hair removal, and skin care services including facials treatments are all available at SkinMD. No refund policy It is the policy of SkinMD that no refunds will be issued once an initial purchase has been made. If treatment is declined, the purchaser may receive the full amount in house credit* toward alternative treatments or products. Only the amount paid is redeemable towards house credit taking into account discounts that were taken at the time of original purchase. When treatment packages are used the full cost of each treatment will be deducted from the amount paid and the remaining balance is what will be available for redemption toward house credit if other treatment options are pursued. *House credit has no cash value and may only be redeemed towards either services or products offered by SkinMD. Patient Financing and Payment Options At SkinMD Seattle Laser & Aesthetic Medical Clinic, we strive to make your treatments affordable. The needs and preferences of our patients and clients come first and foremost. Our prices are competitive and you get best results and greater value if you purchase treatment packages rather than pay for individual treatments. We accept cash, credit cards and offer third party patient financing through Care Credit. Additionally, we offer in-house financing with a minimum deposit of 25% to 50% of the total cost of your treatment. The balance to be paid in pre- arranged installments. Your treatments will begin once full payment has been received. A one-time administrative fee of $15 is added to your deposit for all treatments financed. No finance charges are assessed. Our experienced staff can guide you through the payment process regardless of your modality of payment.

item.title: Physician Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
At SkinMD our physicians perform state-of-the-art procedures in minimally invasive cosmetic enhancements, cosmetic laser, radiofrequency and light therapies, such as hair reduction, rosacea therapy, vascular therapy, collagen enhancement, scar therapy, wrinkle reduction, texture enhancement and complexion blending. At SkinMD our goal is to improve the efficacy of cosmetic therapies and skin care for people of all colors.

Cosmetic Treatments

Botox Wrinkle reduction Perspiration treatment Cortisone Injections Peels Dermal Fillers Retsylane Perlane Juvederm Ultra Juvederm Ultra Plus

Laser Treatments

ActiveFX Fractional CO2 Laser Skin Resurfacing Hair Reduction Intense Pulsed Light (IPL) Collagen Enhancement Complexion Blending & Texture Enhancement Scar Therapy Rosacea Therapy

item.title: MedSpa Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Skin Consultation with Visia Analysis (60 minutes) PCA Signature Facial (75 minutes) The ultimate in smoothing, strengthening, refining and brightening your skin. We perform gentle exfoliation, apply Hemoglobe to promote circulation and extractions as necessary. We pay special attention to your eyes and your lips to facilitate decreasing fine lines. Treat yourself today! Deep Clean Facial for Men (60 minutes) This effective treatment, is designed to deep-clean and soothe aggressive exposure related to sports and shaving. Medical grade products fortified with vitamins and antioxidants ensure visible results. Exfoliation, facial massage and re-hydration complete this purifying treatment. This treatment will leave your skin refreshed and invigorated. Clarifying Facial for oily or acne prone skin (60 minutes) This treatment includes a deep cleansing, gentle exfoliation and extractions as needed. Detoxify and decongest. Vitamin C Facial for all skin types (60 minutes) Get your glow on with this skin boosting treatment. Sun exposure, pollution, smoking, a poor diet and daily stress all trigger the release of free radicals, which can cause premature aging of the skin. Antioxidant Vitamin C is scientifically proven to increase collagen, fight free radical damage and reverse the signs of aging. Our Vitamin C facial gently exfoliates and protects fragile skin. The combination of medical grade serums and hydrators used, leave your skin with a healthy glow. Rejuvenating Facial for mature or dry skin types (75 minutes) This skin reviving treatment includes exfoliation and a hydrating, pore-stimulating mask. European Facial (90 minutes) Indulge yourself with this classic facial with a medical twist. We cleanse, steam, exfoliate, then apply a mask and finish with hydration appropriate for your skin type. A relaxing facial massage completes the treatment. Back or Chest Refinement (60 minutes) Refine and Rejuvenate the skin of your back or chest with this treatment. Reclaim silky skin with this clinical facial. Refinage: Resurface and Refine Advanced Skin Refining Treatment for all skin types (60 minutes) Reveal more radiant, clear complexion and benefit from the advanced exfoliation of crystal-free microdermabrasion, combined with an antioxidant, pigment suppressor- rich, gentle but clinically effective peel. Minimizes pore size, reduces lines and wrinkles, brightens dull, photoaged,or hyperpigmented skin. Treatment is well tolerated by those with sensitive skin, rosacea, inflamed acne or dehydrated skin. Dramatic results without discomfort and downtime. Resurface, renew, refine & strengthen your skin with SkinMD's Refinage facial treatment. Facials & Peels To relax and rejuvenate, while benefiting your skin at the same time, you may want to consider the revitalizing effects and results that can be experienced with a medical spa facial. Therapeutic facials are a fast and affordable way to improve your skin while relaxing and enjoying well-deserved "me time." At SkinMD Seattle Laser & Aesthetic Medical Clinic, we offer a variety of therapeutic facials for men and women, who are looking to cleanse, rejuvenate, exfoliate, hydrate and strengthen their skin. Chemical peels are an excellent way for patients to improve problem skin, and improve complexion and texture by stimulating the turnover of skin cells. While therapeutic facials address the upper layer of skin, chemical peels address the upper and lower skin layers and significantly stimulate cell turnover. Deeper chemical peels have the ability to remove the dead skin from the top layer and reveal fresh skin from underneath. Call or email to schedule a comprehensive consultation to see what therapeutic facial or peel treatments are best for you.

item.title: Botox Club
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: If you have been thinking about getting BOTOX® Cosmetic, SkinMD’s BOTOX® Club may be the answer for you. In 2002 the FDA approved BOTOX® Cosmetic for use in minimizing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for the glabella lines-those between the brows. BOTOX® Cosmetic has been America’s #1 cosmetic procedure since then. In 2006 more than 3.1* million men and women were treated, with numbers expected to grow over the next decade. Botox Cosmetic is leading the pack for non- surgical procedures, which have increased an average of 735 per cent since 1997*. Botox Cosmetic’s ability to provide a quick, effective and elegant reduction wrinkles has given rise to the BOTOX® Party. BOTOX® Parties offers groups of friends and strangers a great way to meet and mingle in a comfortable and relaxed setting with the added bonus of experiencing the wrinkle reducing benefits of a BOTOX® Cosmetic treatment. SkinMD’s BOTOX® Club is the latest trend in chic beauty treatments, exclusive member benefits, and effective wrinkle reduction. How it works: The BOTOX® Cub is an exclusive membership program designed to offer individuals access to BOTOX® Cosmetic injections in a professional yet comfortable environment with preferred pricing for club members. Benefits include: Preferred pricing** Exclusive events Insider Beauty Tips SkinMD skin care goodie bag BOTOX® benefits to organize and host a party for your friends*** $40 membership fee * ASAPS Cosmetic Surgery National Data Bank. ** 10% off 1st treatment, 15% off 2nd & 20% off on-going treatments when treatments received 4-6 months apart. Cannot be combined with any other pricing or discount programs. *** Requires prior approval from SkinMD management. Contact Deborah Niebla at (206) 525-0903 for more information. BOTOX® Cosmetic is a registered trademark of Allergan.
